content: I also read about it. In the roadmap its written - "SSF is in the research phase. It is not expected to ship for several years, likely after other substantial upgrades such as Verkle trees and Danksharding" , so I am not sure in which areas we can work on as verkle trees and danksharding comes first which will change some things for ssf.

author: bchain99
content: hey <@543900561460822016> had a geth question, are you aware of the where the latest implementation of eip-4844 is in geth? which branch or so? in main branch i don't see implementation of certain engine api methods and the impl link in https://github.com/ethereum/pm/blob/master/Breakout-Room/4844-readiness-checklist.md seems to be outdated(may 31st). There are some PRs and random repos here and there but not sure of the definitive one. anyway you could help here?

author: manav2401
content:
I'd let him answer but I you can filter by the 4844 label in the PRs to get some rough idea. 
https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/pulls?q=is%3Apr+4844+label%3AEIP-4844+is%3Aclosed

author: manav2401
content:
Umm not really. I think as Naman mentioned above, it seems quite in research phase. 
But I'd like to see if there's any need to build PoC (or conduct some implementation work) to expedite the research in someway. 

<@914307919699406908>  / <@686695036733227017>, could you maybe help us connect with appropriate folks who may guide us for the same? Thanks!

content: main branch should be ideally the correct place but i do want to cross check since there seem to be a lot of implementations.

author: oluwafemialofe
content: How true is this statement about ZKP vs EVM not TUring complete enough for the calculation involved

author: dp_specialist
content: only a formal language or formal model of computation can or cannot be Turing-complete. What the image is saying is that in principle the EVM can perform any computation, but if the execution takes too long, it cannot. For example, if a verifier is not efficient it will cost a lot of gas.

author: oluwafemialofe
content: Got that! So Although its Turing complete, if the computaion will be more than the block allowed gas, it becomes impossible right? Not an EVM limitation, just a security to not stalk the EVM like some Denial of Service for upcoming blocks correct?

author: joshd4078
content: Yes. Necessary travel and accommodations. We can also help with visa invitations.
